Celestial Kirin.original_text:
Flying
Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, destroy all permanents with that spell's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: If the Spirit or Arcane spell has {X} in the mana cost, then you use the value of {X} on the stack. For example, Shining Shoal costs {X}{W}{W}. If you choose X = 2, then Shining Shoal’s mana value is 4. Shining Shoal also has an ability that says “You may exile a white card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay Shining Shoal’s mana cost”; if you choose to pay the alternative cost and exile a card with mana value 2, then X is 2 while Shining Shoal is on the stack and its mana value is 4.

Curtain of Light.name: Curtain of Light
Curtain of Light.text:
Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared.
Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)
Draw a card.
Curtain of Light.flavor:
"Paint gold upon the wind, Shape the wind into a shield, And vanish behind the brightness."
—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet
Curtain of Light.original_text:
Target attacking unblocked creature becomes blocked.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: An attacking unblocked creature exists from the time the defending player chooses not to block that creature until the combat phase ends. Curtain of Light doesn’t have any legal targets outside of the combat phase.
Curtain of Light does trigger bushido abilities.

Curtain of Light isn’t particularly effective against creatures with trample. Since the creature with trample has no blocker to assign damage to, all the damage will be assigned to the defending player.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can be cast during any of them as long as it’s after the beginning of that phase’s Declare Blockers Step.

Kiyomaro, First to Stand.name: Kiyomaro, First to Stand
Kiyomaro, First to Stand.text:
Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance.
Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.
Kiyomaro, First to Stand.original_text:
Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance.
Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.

rulings.text: Kiyomaro’s power and toughness don’t affect whether it has vigilance or the life-gain ability.
Losing vigilance after attackers are declared doesn’t cause Kiyomaro to tap.
If you have seven or more cards in hand when Kiyomaro’s triggered ability goes on the stack but less than seven when the ability resolves, the ability does nothing.

Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker.name: Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker
Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker.text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.
Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker.flavor:
"Watch over my father. Tell him I'm safe, but I won't come home until I find out how to bring him back to his senses, and Kamigawa is again at peace."
—Michiko Konda, last letter to General Takeno
Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker.original_text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.

rulings.text: One permanent is sacrificed each time an opponent’s source deals damage to Michiko Konda’s controller. The amount of damage doesn’t matter.
Sources that deal damage multiple times (such as creatures with double strike) will trigger Michiko Konda multiple times.

Spells that deal damage repeatedly trigger Michiko Konda’s ability each time they deal damage. For example, a Glacial Ray spliced onto another Glacial Ray triggers the ability twice (once for each “2 damage” event from the Glacial Ray).

foreign_names.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature que vous contrôlez est mise dans un cimetière depuis le jeu, sacrifiez la Promesse du bunrei. Si vous faites ainsi, mettez en jeu quatre jetons de créature 1/1 incolore Esprit.
foreign_names.flavor: « Je ne crains pas la mort, ni ce que la mort apporte. »

foreign_names.name: Promessa di Bunrei
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura che controlli viene messa in un cimitero dal gioco, sacrifica la Promessa di Bunrei. Se lo fai, metti in gioco quattro pedine creatura Spirito 1/1 incolori.
foreign_names.flavor: "Non ho paura di morire oggi, né temo ciò che la morte porterà."

foreign_names.name: 分霊の確約
foreign_names.text: あなたがコントロールするいずれかのクリーチャーが場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、分霊の確約を生け贄に捧げる。 そうした場合、無色の1/1のスピリット･クリーチャー・トークンを４体場に出す。
foreign_names.flavor: 今日死すことも恐れず、死が何をもたらすかも恐れぬ。

foreign_names.name: Promessa de Bunrei
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que uma criatura que você controla for colocada num cemitério vinda de jogo, sacrifique Promessa de Bunrei. Se o fizer, coloque em jogo quatros fichas de criatura incolor 1/1 do tipo Espírito.
foreign_names.flavor: "Não tenho medo de morrer hoje nem do que a morte vai trazer."

foreign_names.name: 分灵之诺
foreign_names.text: 每当一个由你操控的生物从场上置入坟墓场时，牺牲分灵之诺。 若你如此作，则将四个1/1无色精怪衍生物放置进场。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我不怕命丧今朝，亦无惧身后际遇。」

Pure Intentions.name: Pure Intentions
Pure Intentions.text:
Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Pure Intentions, return Pure Intentions from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
Pure Intentions.original_text:
Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Pure Intentions, return Pure Intentions from your graveyard to your hand at end of turn.

rulings.text: The first part of Pure Intentions is the effect of casting Pure Intentions. The second part is a triggered ability that triggers whenever an opponent’s spell or ability causes a player to discard Pure Intentions.
Neither part cares who decides which card to discard — only the controller of the spell or ability matters.
Discarding Pure Intentions to your own spell or ability doesn’t trigger its abilities.

If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a player to discard multiple cards, such as Waking Nightmare or Three Tragedies, Pure Intentions doesn’t return to hand until its triggered ability has resolved. A player can’t discard the same Pure Intentions twice for the same discard effect.

foreign_names.name: Reine Absichten

Immer wenn ein Zauberspruch oder eine Fähigkeit, den oder die ein Gegner kontrolliert, dazu führt, dass du Reine Absichten aus deiner Hand abwirfst, bringe Reine Absichten am Ende des Zuges aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreign_names.name: 纯净意念

每当由对手所操控的咒语或异能使你从手上弃掉纯净意念，在回合结束时将纯净意念从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

Reverence.name: Reverence

—Masako the Humorless

rulings.text: Unless some effect explicitly says otherwise, a creature that can’t attack you can still attack a planeswalker you control.

Spiritual Visit.name: Spiritual Visit
Spiritual Visit.text:
Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
Spiritual Visit.original_text:
Put a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token into play.
Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

Cloudhoof Kirin.name: Cloudhoof Kirin
Cloudhoof Kirin.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may have target player mill X cards, where X is that spell's mana value.
Cloudhoof Kirin.original_text:
Flying
Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put the top X cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: If the Spirit or Arcane spell has {X} in the mana cost, then you use the value of {X} on the stack. For example, Shining Shoal costs {X}{W}{W}. If you choose X = 2, then Shining Shoal’s mana value is 4. Shining Shoal also has an ability that says “You may exile a white card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay Shining Shoal’s mana cost”; if you choose to pay the alternative cost and exile a card with mana value 2, then X is 2 while Shining Shoal is on the stack and its mana value is 4.

Cut the Earthly Bond.name: Cut the Earthly Bond
Cut the Earthly Bond.text: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.
Cut the Earthly Bond.flavor:
"The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure."
—*The History of Kamigawa*
Cut the Earthly Bond.original_text: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.

foreign_names.name: Irdische Bindungen trennen
foreign_names.text: Bringe eine verzauberte bleibende Karte deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Je mehr Kami den Schleier, der unsere Welt von ihrer trennte, durchschritten, desto schwächer wurde der Schleier; er drohte beim leichtesten Druck zu zerreißen."
—Die Geschichte von Kamigawa

foreign_names.name: Cortar el vínculo terrenal

foreign_names.flavor:
"Cuantos más kami traspasaban el velo que los separaba de nuestro mundo, más débil se hacía el velo, amenazando con desgarrarse a la más mínima presión."
—La historia de Kamigawa

foreign_names.text: Renvoyez le permanent enchanté ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire.

« Plus les kami traversaient le voile qui les séparait de notre monde, plus il faiblissait. Il menaçait de se déchirer à la moindre pression. »
—L'histoire de Kamigawa

foreign_names.name: Recidere i Legami Terreni

"Più numerosi erano i kami che attraversavano il velo che li separava dal nostro mondo, più il velo si indeboliva, minacciando di lacerarsi alla minima pressione."
—La Storia di Kamigawa

Descendant of Soramaro.original_text: {1}{U}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.

foreign_names.name: Abkömmling Soramaros
foreign_names.text: {1}{U}: Betrachte die obersten X Karten deiner Bibliothek und lege sie dann in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Karten auf deiner Hand ist.
foreign_names.flavor: „Soramaro spricht durch mich. Lausche Dann werde ich dir von der Weisheit der Ahnen erzählen."

foreign_names.name: Descendiente de Soramaro
foreign_names.text: {1}{U}: Mira las primeras X cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca, donde X es la cantidad de cartas en tu mano, luego regrésalas en cualquier orden.
foreign_names.flavor: "Soramaro habla a través mío. ¡Escuchen Y les transmitiré la sabiduría de los ancestros."

foreign_names.name: Descendant de Soramaro
foreign_names.text: {1}{U} : Regardez les X cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque, X étant le nombre de cartes dans votre main, et remettez-les dessus dans l'ordre de votre choix.
foreign_names.flavor: « C'est Soramaro qui parle par ma bouche. Écoutez Et je vous livrerai la sagesse des ancêtres. »

foreign_names.name: Discendente di Soramaro
foreign_names.text: {1}{U}: Guarda le prime X carte del tuo grimorio, dove X è pari al numero di carte che hai in mano, poi rimettile a posto nell'ordine che preferisci.
foreign_names.flavor: "Soramaro parla attraverso di me. Ascoltate E vi porterò la saggezza degli antichi."

foreign_names.name: 空麻呂の末裔
foreign_names.text: {1}{U}：あなたのライブラリーの一番上からＸ枚のカードを見る。Ｘはあなたの手札にあるカードの枚数に等しい。その後、それらを好きな順番で元に戻す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: 空麻呂が我が口にて語らん。 聞け！ されば祖先の知恵を授けようぞ。

foreign_names.name: Descendente de Soramaro
foreign_names.text: {1}{U}: Olhe os X cards do topo de seu grimório, sendo X igual ao número de cards em sua mão, e depois coloque-os de volta em qualquer ordem.
foreign_names.flavor: "Soramaro fala através de mim. Escuta E eu direi a sabedoria dos ancestrais."

foreign_names.name: 空麻吕后裔
foreign_names.text: {1}{U}：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为你的手牌数量，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。
foreign_names.flavor: 「空麻吕藉我传言。 注意听！ 我将传述先祖的智慧。」

Dreamcatcher.name: Dreamcatcher
Dreamcatcher.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.
Dreamcatcher.flavor:
"Be careful where your mind wanders. Even in the quietest moments, the kami are listening, and your thoughts give them shape."
—Lady Azami
Dreamcatcher.original_text: Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.

foreign_names.name: Traumfänger
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn du einen Geist oder einen arkanen Zauber spielst, kannst du den Traumfänger opfern. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Sei vorsichtig, wohin deine Gedanken wandern. Selbst in den ruhigsten Momenten hören die Kami zu, und deine Gedanken geben ihnen eine Form."
—Herrin Azami

foreign_names.name: Atrapasueños
foreign_names.text: Siempre que juegues un hechizo arcano o de Espíritu, puedes sacrificar el Atrapasueños. Si lo haces, roba una carta.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Ten cuidado con lo que piensas. Incluso en los momentos más tranquilos, los kami están escuchando, y tus pensamientos les dan forma."
—Señora Azami

foreign_names.name: Attrapeur de rêves
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort d'esprit ou d'arcane, vous pouvez sacrifier l'Attrapeur de rêves. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Prenez garde à ne pas laisser errer votre esprit. Même quand tout est calme, les kami écoutent, et vos pensées leur donnent forme. »
—Dame Azami

foreign_names.name: Acchiappasogni
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia Spirito o Arcano, puoi sacrificare l'Acchiappasogni. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Fai attenzione a dove vaga la tua mente. Anche nei momenti più tranquilli, i kami ascoltano e i tuoi pensieri danno loro forma."
—Lady Azami

foreign_names.name: 夢捉え
foreign_names.text: あなたがスピリット呪文か秘儀呪文をプレイするたび、あなたは夢捉えを生け贄に捧げてもよい。 そうした場合、カードを１枚引く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット
foreign_names.flavor:
心が迷いだしたら注意するのだね。 どれほど静かにしていても神は耳をそばだてていて、お前の思いは形を成すのだ。
――あざみ

foreign_names.name: Apanhador de Sonhos
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que você jogar uma mágica Arcana ou de Espírito, você pode sacrificar Apanhador de Sonhos. Se você o fizer, compre um card.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Tenha cuidado por onde sua mente vaga. Mesmo nos momentos mais calmos, os kamis estão escutando, e seus pensamentos dão forma a eles."
— Dama Azami

foreign_names.name: 捕梦怪
foreign_names.text: 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，你可以牺牲捕梦怪。 若你如此作，则抓一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor:
「莫让思绪随处漫游。 神明能聆听最低微的声响，人们的思想也能赋予他们形体。」
～蓟夫人

Erayo, Soratami Ascendant // Erayo's Ess.name: Erayo, Soratami Ascendant // Erayo's Essence
Erayo, Soratami Ascendant // Erayo's Ess.text: Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, counter that spell.
Erayo, Soratami Ascendant // Erayo's Ess.original_text: Counter the first spell played by each opponent each turn.

rulings.text: Erayo’s Essence triggers only for the first spell an opponent casts in a given turn. It doesn’t trigger off any other spell that player casts after the first.

If Erayo, Soratami Ascendant flips while an opponent’s first spell for the turn is still on the stack, the ability of Erayo’s Essence doesn’t trigger because the opponent’s spell has already been cast. The spell isn’t countered.
If you have multiple opponents, Erayo’s Essence can trigger once for each opponent.
Each Ascendant is legendary in both its unflipped and flipped forms. This means that effects that look for legendary creature cards, such as Time of Need and Captain Sisay, can find an Ascendant.
Erayo, Soratami Ascendant is banned as a commander in Duel Commander format, but it may be part of your deck.

Eternal Dominion.name: Eternal Dominion
Eternal Dominion.text:
Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)
Eternal Dominion.original_text:
Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't play spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

foreign_names.name: Ewige Herrschaft
foreign_names.text: Durchsuche die Bibliothek eines Gegners deiner Wahl nach einem Artefakt, einer Kreatur, einer Verzauberung oder einem Land. Bringe diese Karte unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel. Dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek. Episch (Für den Rest des Spiels kannst du keine Zaubersprüche spielen. Kopiere zu Beginn jedes deiner Versorgungssegmente diesen Zauberspruch außer seiner epischen Fähigkeit. Du kannst neue Ziele für die Kopie bestimmen.)

foreign_names.name: Dominio eterno
foreign_names.text: Busca una carta de artefacto, criatura, encantamiento o tierra en la biblioteca del oponente objetivo. Pon esa carta en juego bajo tu control. Luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca. Épico (No puedes jugar hechizos por el resto del juego. Al comienzo de cada uno de tus mantenimientos, copia este hechizo excepto por su habilidad épica. Puedes elegir un nuevo objetivo para la copia.)

foreign_names.name: Domination éternelle
foreign_names.text: Cherchez dans la bibliothèque de l'adversaire ciblé une carte d'artefact, de créature, d'enchantement ou de terrain. Mettez en jeu cette carte, sous votre contrôle. Ce joueur mélange ensuite sa bibliothèque. Épique (Pour le restant de la partie, vous ne pouvez pas jouer de sorts. Au début de chacun de vos entretiens, copiez ce sort à l'exception de sa capacité d'épique. Vous pouvez choisir une nouvelle cible pour cette copie.)

foreign_names.name: Dominio Eterno
foreign_names.text: Passa in rassegna il grimorio di un avversario bersaglio e scegli una carta artefatto, creatura, incantesimo o terra. Metti in gioco quella carta sotto il tuo controllo. Poi quel giocatore rimescola il proprio grimorio. Epopea (Per il resto della partita, non puoi giocare magie. All'inizio di ogni tuo mantenimento, copia questa magia tranne la sua abilità epopea. Puoi scegliere un nuovo bersaglio per la copia.)

foreign_names.name: 永遠の統制
foreign_names.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーのライブラリーからアーティファクト・カード１枚かクリーチャー・カード１枚かエンチャント・カード１枚か土地カード１枚を探す。 そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で場に出す。 その後、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。 歴伝 （残りのゲームの間、あなたは呪文をプレイできない。 あなたの各アップキープの開始時に、この呪文を歴伝能力を除いてコピーする。 あなたはコピーの新しい対象を選んでもよい。）

foreign_names.name: Soberania Eterna
foreign_names.text: Procure no grimório do oponente alvo por um card de artefato, criatura, encantamento ou terreno. Coloque aquele card em jogo sob o seu controle. Depois, aquele jogador embaralha seu próprio grimório. Épica (Você não pode jogar mágicas pelo resto do duelo. No início de cada uma de suas manutenções, copie esta mágica menos sua habilidade épica. Você pode escolher um novo alvo para a cópia.)

foreign_names.name: 不朽霸权
foreign_names.text: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张神器，生物，结界，或地牌， 并将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。 然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。 历传（这盘游戏结束之前，你不能使用咒语。 在你每回合的维持开始时，复制此咒语，但不包含其历传异能。 你可以为该复制选择新的目标。）

Evermind.name: Evermind
Evermind.text:
(Nonexistent mana costs can't be paid.)
Draw a card.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
Evermind.original_text:
(Spells without mana costs can't be played.)
Draw a card.
Evermind is blue.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: Evermind is a blue Arcane instant card. Cards that check whether a card has any of those attributes will affect Evermind. For example, you can exile it (as a blue card) to pay the alternative costs of spells like Force of Will and Disrupting Shoal (X = 0). You could search for it with Mystical Tutor because it’s an instant or Eerie Procession because it’s an Arcane spell.
Evermind is blue in all zones.
If a spell or effect, such as Parallectric Feedback, asks for Evermind’s converted mana cost, it’s 0.
Evermind has no mana cost, which means it can’t normally be cast as a spell. You could, however, cast it via some alternate means, like with Sunforger or Kaho, Minamo Historian.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.
You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

Although originally printed with a characteristic-defining ability that defined its color, this card now has a color indicator. This color indicator can’t be affected by text-changing effects (such as the one created by Crystal Spray), although color-changing effects can still overwrite it.
This has no mana cost, which means its mana cost can’t be paid for effects such as replicate from Djinn Illuminatus or flashback from Snapcaster Mage.

foreign_names.name: Erinnerimmer
foreign_names.text:
(Zaubersprüche ohne Manakosten können nicht gespielt werden.)
Ziehe eine Karte.
Erinnerimmer ist blau.
Arkane Kopplung {1}{U} (Sowie du einen arkanen Zauberspruch spielst, kannst du diese Karte aus deiner Hand vorzeigen und ihre Kopplungskosten bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, füge dem Zauberspruch den Effekt dieser Karte hinzu.)

foreign_names.name: Mente eterna

Imprégnation d'arcane {1}{U} (Au moment où vous jouez un sort d'arcane, vous pouvez révéler cette carte depuis votre main et payer son coût d'imprégnation. Si vous le faites, ajoutez les effets de cette carte à ce sort.)

foreign_names.name: Menteterna

Unire nell'Arcano {1}{U} (Mentre giochi una magia Arcano, puoi rivelare questa carta dalla tua mano e pagare il suo costo di unione. Se lo fai, aggiungi l'effetto di questa carta a quella magia.)

連繋（秘儀） {1}{U}（あなたが秘儀呪文をプレイするに際し、あなたはこのカードを手札から公開して、連繋コストを支払ってもよい。 そうした場合、このカードの効果をその呪文に加える。）

Freed from the Real.name: Freed from the Real
Freed from the Real.text:
Enchant creature

{U}: Untap enchanted creature.

Freed from the Real.original_text:
{U}: Tap enchanted creature.
{U}: Untap enchanted creature.

rulings.text: Only the player who controls Freed from the Real can activate its abilities. This might not be the controller of the enchanted creature.

foreign_names.name: Vom Reellen befreit
foreign_names.text:
{U}: Tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
{U}: Enttappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
foreign_names.flavor: Wenn sich ein starker Geist bewegt, passen sich Form und Energie achtsam daran an.

foreign_names.name: Liberado de lo real
foreign_names.text:
{U}: Gira la criatura encantada.
{U}: Endereza la criatura encantada.
foreign_names.flavor: Cuando una mente fuerte se mueve, la forma y la energía se alteran para obedecerle.

foreign_names.text:
{U} : Engagez la créature enchantée.
{U} : Dégagez la créature enchantée.
foreign_names.flavor: Quand un esprit fort se déplace, la forme et l'énergie se courbent pour l'écouter.

foreign_names.name: Libero dalla Realtà

{U}: TAPpa la creatura incantata.
{U}: STAPpa la creatura incantata.
foreign_names.flavor: Quando una mente potente si muove, la forma e l'energia si spostano per prestarle attenzione.

foreign_names.name: 現実からの遊離
foreign_names.text:
{U}：エンチャントされているクリーチャーをタップする。

foreign_names.name: Libertos da Realidade

{U}: Vira a criatura encantada.
{U}: Desvira a criatura encantada.
foreign_names.flavor: Quando uma mente forte se move, a forma e a energia mudam para observá-la.

foreign_names.name: 逸脱实界

{U}：横置受此结界的生物。
{U}：重置受此结界的生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 形体与能量将随坚强心灵而行。

Ideas Unbound.name: Ideas Unbound
Ideas Unbound.text: Draw three cards. Discard three cards at the beginning of the next end step.
Ideas Unbound.flavor: The apprentice stared in puzzlement. "But Master, you finished writing those spells just yesterday. Don't you remember?" The jushi's heart froze.
Ideas Unbound.original_text: Draw three cards. Discard three cards at end of turn.

rulings.text: If you don’t have three or more cards in hand at the end of turn, you discard what cards you have.

foreign_names.name: Losgelöste Ideen
foreign_names.text: Ziehe drei Karten. Wirf am Ende des Zuges drei Karten ab.
foreign_names.flavor: Der Lehrling schaute ungläubig. „Aber Meister, Ihr hattet diese Spruchrollen gerade gestern fertiggestellt. Erinnert Ihr Euch nicht?" Der Jushi erschauderte.

foreign_names.name: Ideas liberadas
foreign_names.text: Roba tres cartas. Descarta tres cartas al final del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: El aprendiz lo miró atónito. "Pero maestro, terminó de escribir esos hechizos tan solo ayer. ¿No lo recuerda?" El corazón del jushi se congeló.

foreign_names.name: Idées délivrées
foreign_names.text: Piochez trois cartes. Défaussez-vous de trois cartes à la fin du tour.
foreign_names.flavor: L'apprenti le regarda, étonné. « Maître, mais vous avez fini d'écrire ces sorts hier. Vous ne vous rappelez pas ? » Le sang du jushi se glaça dans ses veines.

foreign_names.name: Idee in Libertà
foreign_names.text: Pesca tre carte. Scarta tre carte alla fine del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: L'apprendista lo fissò incredulo. "Maestro, avete finito di scrivere quelle magie soltanto ieri. Non vi ricordate?" Il cuore dello jushi si raggelò.

foreign_names.name: 留まらぬ発想
foreign_names.text: カードを３枚引く。 ターン終了時に、カードを３枚捨てる。
foreign_names.flavor: 弟子は困惑してそれを見つめていた。 「しかし師よ、あなたはその呪文を昨日書き終えたはずです。 憶えておられぬのですか？」 呪師の心臓は凍りついた。

foreign_names.name: Idéias Soltas
foreign_names.text: Compre três cards. Descarte três cards no final do turno.
foreign_names.flavor: O aprendiz olhou confuso. "Mas Mestre, você terminou de escrever essas mágicas ainda ontem. Não se lembra?" O coração do jushi congelou.

foreign_names.name: 思绪奔逸
foreign_names.text: 抓三张牌。 在回合结束时，弃三张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 学徒狐疑地盯着。 「大师，您昨天才写完这几个咒语。 您忘了吗？」术士心底打了个冷颤。

Kaho, Minamo Historian.name: Kaho, Minamo Historian
Kaho, Minamo Historian.text:
When Kaho, Minamo Historian enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards, exile them, then shuffle.
{X}, {T}: You may cast a spell with mana value X from among cards exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.
Kaho, Minamo Historian.original_text:
When Kaho, Minamo Historian comes into play, search your library for up to three instant cards and remove them from the game. Then shuffle your library.
{X}, {T}: You may play a card with converted mana cost X removed from the game with Kaho without paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: If an effect takes a card Kaho exiled out of the Exile zone, then you can’t use Kaho’s ability to cast that card.
If another player gains control of Kaho, that player may cast any of the cards exiled with Kaho’s ability.
Kaho’s activated ability refers only to cards exiled by its triggered ability. If another effect exiled the cards, you won’t be able to use Kaho to cast those cards.

foreign_names.name: Kaho, Historikerin von Minamo
foreign_names.text: Wenn Kaho, Historikerin von Minamo ins Spiel kommt, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach bis zu drei Spontanzauberkarten und entferne diese ganz aus dem Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek. {X}, {T}: Du kannst eine Karte mit den umgewandelten Manakosten von X, die durch Kaho ganz aus dem Spiel entfernt wurde, spielen, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.

foreign_names.name: Kaho, historiadora de Minamo
foreign_names.text: Cuando Kaho, historiadora de Minamo entre en juego, busca en tu biblioteca hasta tres cartas de instantáneo y remuévelas del juego. Luego baraja tu biblioteca. {X}, {T}: Puedes jugar una carta con coste de maná convertido de X removida del juego con Kaho sin pagar su coste de maná.

foreign_names.name: Kaho, historienne de Minamo
foreign_names.text: Quand Kaho, historienne de Minamo arrive en jeu, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque jusqu'à trois cartes d'éphémère et retirez-les de la partie. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque. {X}, {T} : Vous pouvez jouer une carte avec un coût converti de mana de X retirée de la partie par Kaho, historienne de Minamo sans payer son coût de mana.

foreign_names.name: Kaho, Storica di Minamo
foreign_names.text: Quando Kaho, Storica di Minamo entra in gioco, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegli fino a tre carte istantaneo e rimuovile dal gioco. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio. {X}, {T}: Puoi giocare una carta con costo di mana convertito pari a X rimossa dal gioco con Kaho senza pagare il suo costo di mana.

foreign_names.name: 水面院の歴史家、歌穂
foreign_names.text: 水面院の歴史家、歌穂が場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーから最大３枚までのインスタント･カードを探し、それらをゲームから取り除く。 その後、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。 {X}, {T}：あなたは水面院の歴史家、歌穂によってゲームから取り除かれた、点数で見たマナ・コストがXのカード１枚を、マナ・コストを支払わずにプレイしてもよい。
foreign_names.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreign_names.name: Kaho, Historiadora de Minamo
foreign_names.text: Quando Kaho, Historiadora de Minamo entra em jogo, procure em seu grimório por até três cards de mágicas instantâneas e remova-os de jogo. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório. {X}, {T}: Você pode jogar um card com custo de mana convertido X removido de jogo com Kaho sem pagar o seu custo de mana.

foreign_names.name: 水面院史家歌穗
foreign_names.text: 当水面院史家歌穗进场时，从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张瞬间牌，并将它们移出对战。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 {X}，{T}：你可以使用以歌穗移出对战、总法术力费用为X的一张牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

Kami of the Crescent Moon.name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
Kami of the Crescent Moon.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
Kami of the Crescent Moon.flavor:
"He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick."
—Toshiro Umezawa
Kami of the Crescent Moon.original_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws a card.

rulings.text: The additional draw triggers just after the normal draw for the turn happens.

foreign_names.name: Kami des zunehmenden Mondes
foreign_names.text: Zu Beginn des Ziehsegments jedes Spielers zieht dieser Spieler eine zusätzliche Karte.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Er ähnelt mir in vielen Dingen, der herrenlose kleine Kami unbeeindruckt von Würde und nie ohne ein Ass im Ärmel."
—Toshiro Umezawa

foreign_names.name: Kami de la luna creciente
foreign_names.text: Al comienzo del paso de robar de cada jugador, ese jugador roba una carta.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Es muy parecido a mí, ese pequeño kami sin maestro . . . no le impresiona la grandeza y nunca deja pasar un truco."
—Toshiro Umezawa

foreign_names.name: Kami du croissant de lune
foreign_names.text: Au début de l'étape de pioche de chaque joueur, ce joueur pioche une carte.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Il me ressemble, ce petit kami indompté . . . Il n'est jamais impressionné par la grandeur et il ne manque pas de jouer des tours. »
—Toshiro Umezawa

foreign_names.name: Kami della Luna Crescente
foreign_names.text: All'inizio della propria acquisizione, ogni giocatore pesca una carta.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Mi assomiglia molto, quel piccolo kami senza padrone. . . non si fa impressionare dallo sfarzo e ha sempre un asso nella manica."
—Toshiro Umezawa

foreign_names.name: 三日月の神
foreign_names.text: 各プレイヤーのドロー･ステップの開始時に、そのプレイヤーはカードを１枚引く。
foreign_names.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — スピリット
foreign_names.flavor:
主無き小さな神よ。やつは俺によく似ている … … ちっぽけな存在で、見向かれもしない。
――梅澤俊郎

foreign_names.name: Kami da Lua Crescente
foreign_names.text: No início da etapa de compra de cada jogador, aquele jogador compra um card.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Ele se parece bastante comigo, aquele pequeno kami sem mestre . . . não se impressiona com grandeza e sempre tem tempo para um truque."
— Toshiro Umezawa

foreign_names.name: 新月神
foreign_names.text: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手抓一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor:
「这无主神明倒很像我. . . 貌不惊人，诡计多端。」
～梅泽俊郎

Kiri-Onna.name: Kiri-Onna
Kiri-Onna.text:
When Kiri-Onna enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kiri-Onna to its owner's hand.
Kiri-Onna.original_text:
When Kiri-Onna comes into play, return target creature to its owner's hand.
Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kiri-Onna to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: If there are no other creatures on the battlefield as Kiri-Onna enters the battlefield, you must target Kiri-Onna with its own ability.

foreign_names.name: Kiri-Onna
foreign_names.text:
Wenn die Kiri-Onna ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Immer wenn du einen Geist oder einen arkanen Zauber spielst, kannst du Kiri-Onna auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurückbringen.

foreign_names.name: Kiri-Onna
foreign_names.text:
Cuando la Kiri-Onna entre en juego, regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Siempre que juegues un hechizo arcano o de Espíritu, puedes regresar la Kiri-Onna a la mano de su propietario.

foreign_names.name: Kiri-onna
foreign_names.text:
Quand la Kiri-onna arrive en jeu, renvoyez la créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort d'esprit ou d'arcane, vous pouvez renvoyer la Kiri-onna dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreign_names.name: Kiri-Onna
foreign_names.text:
Quando Kiri-Onna entra in gioco, il proprietario riprende in mano una creatura bersaglio.
Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia Spirito o Arcano, puoi far tornare Kiri-Onna in mano al suo proprietario.

foreign_names.name: 霧女
foreign_names.text:
霧女が場に出たとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
あなたがスピリット呪文か秘儀呪文をプレイするたび、あなたは霧女をオーナーの手札に戻してもよい。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreign_names.name: Kiri-Onna
foreign_names.text:
Quando Kiri-Onna entra em jogo, devolve a criatura alvo para a mão de seu dono.
Toda vez que você jogar uma mágica Arcana ou de Espírito, você pode devolver Kiri-Onna para a mão de seu dono.

foreign_names.name: 雾女
foreign_names.text:
当雾女进场时，将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，你可以将雾女移回你手上。

Meishin, the Mind Cage.name: Meishin, the Mind Cage
Meishin, the Mind Cage.text: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
Meishin, the Mind Cage.flavor: It's dangerous indeed to be lost in someone else's thoughts.
Meishin, the Mind Cage.original_text: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

foreign_names.name: Meishin, der Gedankenkäfig
foreign_names.text: Alle Kreaturen erhalten -X/-0, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Karten auf deiner Hand ist.
foreign_names.flavor: Es ist gefährlich, in den Gedanken jemandes anderen gefangen zu sein.

foreign_names.name: Meishin, la jaula mental
foreign_names.text: Todas las criaturas obtienen -X/-0, donde X es el número de cartas en tu mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Es muy peligroso perderse en los pensamientos de otro.

foreign_names.name: Meishin, la cage cérébrale
foreign_names.text: Toutes les créatures gagnent -X/-0, X étant le nombre de cartes dans votre main.
foreign_names.flavor: Il est toujours dangereux d'être perdu dans les pensées d'autrui.

foreign_names.name: Meishin, la Gabbia Mentale
foreign_names.text: Tutte le creature prendono -X/-0, dove X è pari al numero di carte che hai in mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Perdersi nei pensieri di un'altra persona è davvero pericoloso.

foreign_names.name: 精神の檻、迷心
foreign_names.text: すべてのクリーチャーは-X/-0の修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたの手札のカードの枚数に等しい。
foreign_names.type: 伝説のエンチャント（場）
foreign_names.flavor: 誰かの思考の中に迷うのは実に危険だ。

foreign_names.name: Meishin, a Prisão da Mente
foreign_names.text: Todas as criaturas recebem -X/-0, sendo X igual ao número de cards em sua mão.
foreign_names.flavor: É realmente perigoso perder-se nos pensamentos de outra pessoa.

foreign_names.name: 灵枷迷心
foreign_names.text: 所有生物得-X/-0，X为你的手牌数量。
foreign_names.flavor: 至险境地便是迷失在他人的思绪中。

Minamo Scrollkeeper.name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
Minamo Scrollkeeper.text:
Defender
Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
Minamo Scrollkeeper.flavor: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.
Minamo Scrollkeeper.original_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Your maximum hand size is increased by one.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Minamo Scrollkeeper onto the battlefield, your maximum hand size will be three. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

foreign_names.name: Minamo-Spruchbewahrerin
foreign_names.text:
Verteidiger (Diese Kreatur kann nicht angreifen.)
Deine maximale Handkartenzahl ist um eins erhöht.
foreign_names.flavor: Die Spruchbewahrer verließen ihren Platz an den Türen der großen Bibliothek auch dann nicht, als die Oger und ihre Oni-Gebieter durch Minamo tobten.

foreign_names.name: Cuida pergaminos de Minamo
foreign_names.text:
Defensor (Esta criatura no puede atacar.)
Tu tamaño máximo de mano aumenta en uno.
foreign_names.flavor: Los cuida pergaminos nunca se alejaron un centímetro de las puertas de la Gran Biblioteca, ni siquiera cuando los ogros y sus amos oni invadieron Minamo.

foreign_names.name: Gardien des parchemins de Minamo
foreign_names.text:
Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.)
La taille maximale de votre main est augmentée de un.
foreign_names.flavor: Les gardiens des parchemins ne s'éloignaient jamais des portes de la Grande bibliothèque, pas même quand les ogres et leurs maîtres oni envahirent Minamo.

foreign_names.name: Curapergamene di Minamo
foreign_names.text:
Difensore (Questa creatura non può attaccare.)
Il numero massimo di carte che puoi tenere in mano è aumentato di uno.
foreign_names.flavor: I custodi delle pergamene non si sono mai allontanati di un passo dalle porte della Grande Biblioteca, neppure quando gli ogre e i loro signori oni imperversarono a Minamo.

foreign_names.name: 水面院の巻物守り
foreign_names.text:
防衛（このクリーチャーは攻撃に参加できない。）
あなたの手札の最大枚数は１増える。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: 巻物守りは大書庫の入り口から一吋と動かなかった。大峨とその主の鬼が水面院を襲ったときですら。

foreign_names.name: Guarda-Pergaminhos de Minamo
foreign_names.text:
Defensor (Esta criatura não pode atacar.)
O número máximo permitido de cards na sua mão aumenta em um.
foreign_names.flavor: Os guardiões de pergaminhos nunca se afastavam nem uma polegada das portas da Grande Biblioteca, nem mesmo quando ogres e seus mestres onis varreram Minamo.

foreign_names.name: 水面院卷轴护卫
foreign_names.text:
守军（此生物不能攻击）
你的手牌上限增加一张。
foreign_names.flavor: 卷轴护卫从不离开大书院门口半步，即使食人魔与其邪鬼主子横扫水面院时亦然。

Moonbow Illusionist.name: Moonbow Illusionist
Moonbow Illusionist.text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Moonbow Illusionist.original_text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target land's type becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

rulings.text: Only the targeted land is affected.
The land’s name as well as any supertype it might have (such as legendary) remains unchanged.

foreign_names.name: Mondbogen-Illusionist
foreign_names.text: Fliegend {2}, bringe ein Land, das du kontrollierst, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück: Der Typ eines Lands deiner Wahl wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einem Standardlandtyp, den du bestimmst.

foreign_names.name: Ilusionista arco lunar
foreign_names.text: Vuela. {2}, regresar una tierra que controles a la mano de su propietario: El tipo de la tierra objetivo es el tipo de tierra básica de tu elección hasta el final del turno.

foreign_names.name: Illusionniste lunarc
foreign_names.text: Vol {2}, Renvoyez un terrain que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire : Le type du terrain ciblé devient le type de terrain de base de votre choix jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreign_names.name: Illusionista Arcodiluna
foreign_names.text: Volare {2}, Il proprietario riprende in mano una terra che tu controlli: Il tipo di una terra bersaglio diventa un tipo di terra base a tua scelta fino alla fine del turno.

foreign_names.name: 月弓の幻術師
foreign_names.text: 飛行 {2}, あなたがコントロールする土地を１つオーナーの手札に戻す：土地１つを対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それのタイプは、あなたが選んだ１つの基本地形タイプになる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ムーンフォーク・ウィザード

foreign_names.name: Ilusionista Arco da Lua
foreign_names.text: Voar {2}, Devolve um terreno que você controla para a mão de seu dono: O tipo do terreno alvo se torna do tipo de terreno básico de sua escolha até o final do turno.

foreign_names.name: 月弓幻影师
foreign_names.text: 飞行{2}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：选择一种基本地类别，目标地成为该类别的地直到回合结束。

Murmurs from Beyond.name: Murmurs from Beyond
Murmurs from Beyond.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.
Murmurs from Beyond.flavor: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.
Murmurs from Beyond.original_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.

foreign_names.name: Rauschen aus dem Untergrund
foreign_names.text: Decke die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Ein Gegner bestimmt eine davon. Lege diese Karte auf deinen Friedhof und nimm die anderen auf deine Hand.
foreign_names.flavor: Vergleiche die Hände der Kami mit Nebelbänken, die gefährliche Felsen vor den Augen der Seefahrer verbergen.

foreign_names.name: Murmullos del más allá
foreign_names.text: Muestra las tres cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Un oponente elige una. Pon esa carta en tu cementerio y el resto en tu mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Como los bancos de niebla que esconden peligrosas rocas de los ojos de los marineros, así eran las manos de los kami.

foreign_names.name: Murmures de l'au-delà
foreign_names.text: Révélez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Un adversaire en choisit une. Mettez cette carte dans votre cimetière et le reste dans votre main.
foreign_names.flavor: Les mains des kami agissaient comme les volutes de brouillard qui cachaient les rochers aux yeux des marins.

foreign_names.name: Sussurro Infernale
foreign_names.text: Rivela le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Un avversario ne sceglie una. Metti quella carta nel tuo cimitero e aggiungi le rimanenti alla tua mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Come banchi di nebbia che nascondono gli scogli letali agli occhi dei marinai, così agivano le mani dei kami.

foreign_names.name: 彼方からの呟き
foreign_names.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを公開する。 いずれかの対戦相手はそのうち１枚を選ぶ。 そのカードをあなたの墓地に置き、残りをあなたの手札に加える。
foreign_names.type: インスタント — 秘儀
foreign_names.flavor: 霧が剣呑な岩を船乗りの目から隠すように、神の手も隠されている。

foreign_names.name: Murmúrios do Além
foreign_names.text: Revele os três cards do topo de seu grimório. Um oponente escolhe um. Coloque aquele card em seu cemitério e o restante em sua mão.
foreign_names.flavor: Como neblina que esconde rochas perigosas dos olhos dos marinheiros, eram também as mãos dos kamis.

foreign_names.name: 他界低语
foreign_names.text: 展示你牌库顶的三张牌。 任一对手从其中选择一张。 将该牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则置于你手上。
foreign_names.flavor: 神明之手如雾团遮蔽暗礁，欲引海员遇险。

Oboro Breezecaller.name: Oboro Breezecaller
Oboro Breezecaller.text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Untap target land.
Oboro Breezecaller.flavor:
"I feel their unnatural influence in the weary, weeping land. Do they care nothing for the creatures who walk below their clouds?"
—Eight-and-a-Half-Tails
Oboro Breezecaller.original_text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Untap target land.

foreign_names.name: Oboro-Brisenrufer
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
{2}, bringe ein Land, das du kontrollierst, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück: Enttappe ein Land deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Ich kann ihren unnatürlichen Einfluss auf das müde, weinende Land fühlen. Sind ihnen die Lebewesen egal, die unterhalb der Wolken leben?"
—Acht-Schwänze-und-ein-halber

foreign_names.name: Llamadora de brisa de Oboro
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
{2}, regresar una tierra que controles a la mano de su propietario: Endereza la tierra objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Siento su influencia sobrenatural en la tierra agotada. ¿No les importan para nada las criaturas que caminan bajo sus nubes?"
—Ocho-colas-y-media

foreign_names.name: Mènebrise d'Oboro
foreign_names.text:
Vol
{2}, Renvoyez un terrain que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire : Dégagez le terrain ciblé.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Je sens leur influence surnaturelle sur la terre en pleurs. Se désintéressent-ils vraiment des créatures qui marchent sous leurs nuages ? »
—Huit-queues-et-demie

foreign_names.name: Evocabrezza di Oboro
foreign_names.text:
Volare
{2}, Il proprietario riprende in mano una terra che tu controlli: STAPpa una terra bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Percepisco la loro influenza innaturale nella terra stanca e piangente. Gli importa forse qualcosa delle creature che camminano sotto alle loro nuvole?"
—Otto-Code-e-Mezza

foreign_names.name: 朧宮の微風呼び
foreign_names.text:
飛行
{2}, あなたがコントロールする土地を１つオーナーの手札に戻す：土地１つを対象とし、それをアンタップする。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ムーンフォーク・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor:
疲れきった嘆きの地に尋常ならぬ力を感じる。 その雲の下を通る生き物に何の素振りも見せぬのか？
――八ツ尾半

foreign_names.name: Convocadora da Brisa de Oboro
foreign_names.text:
Voar
{2}, Devolve um terreno que você controla para a mão de seu dono: Desvira a criatura alvo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Eu sinto a sua influência artificial na terra exaurida que chora. Eles não se importam nem um pouco com as criaturas que andam abaixo das nuvens?"
— Oito-Caudas-e-Meia

foreign_names.name: 胧宫微风师
foreign_names.text:
飞行
{2}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：重置目标地。
foreign_names.flavor:
「我感到大地因他们违逆自然的影响力而逐渐虚弱。 他们难道对云底生灵毫不关心？」
～八尾半

Oboro Envoy.name: Oboro Envoy
Oboro Envoy.text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
Oboro Envoy.original_text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

rulings.text: The errata makes the ability temporary. As printed, the effect didn’t end.
The X will usually include the land returned to pay the ability’s cost.

foreign_names.name: Oboro-Abgesandter
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend

Sakashima the Impostor.name: Sakashima the Impostor
Sakashima the Impostor.text: You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Sakashima the Impostor, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."
Sakashima the Impostor.original_text: As Sakashima the Impostor comes into play, you may choose a creature in play. If you do, Sakashima comes into play as a copy of that creature, except its name is still Sakashima the Impostor, it's still legendary, and it gains "{2}{U}{U}: Return Sakashima the Impostor to its owner's hand at end of turn."

rulings.text: If there is no creature on the battlefield or if you don’t choose a creature as Sakashima enters the battlefield, Sakashima remains a 3/1 Human Rogue.

Sakashima doesn’t get the return to hand ability unless a creature is copied as Sakashima enters the battlefield. Sakashima can’t copy itself because the choice is made as part of the event that puts it onto the battlefield, and whatever will be copied must already be on the battlefield.

Sakashima must be on the battlefield at the end of turn in order to return to hand. If Sakashima leaves the battlefield after the ability is activated but before the at-end-of-turn ability resolves, the ability does nothing.

Shape Stealer.name: Shape Stealer
Shape Stealer.text: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, change Shape Stealer's base power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
Shape Stealer.flavor:
"Stand back. I know just what to do."
—Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
Shape Stealer.original_text: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, change Shape Stealer's power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

rulings.text: Once the ability resolves, changing the other creature’s power or toughness doesn’t affect Shape Stealer.

This ability triggers once for each creature blocked by or blocking Shape Stealer. If multiple creatures block it, Shape Stealer’s power and toughness will change for each one in succession. The first trigger put on the stack will be the last to resolve, so that will set Shape Stealer’s final power and toughness.
The other creature’s power and toughness are determined as the triggered ability resolves.

If the other creature has bushido, whether Shape Stealer gets the bushido bonus depends on whose turn it is. If Shape Stealer is blocking, it won’t get the attacker’s bushido bonus. If the Shape Stealer is being blocked, the bushido ability will resolve just before Shape Stealer determines what the creature’s power and toughness are.
If Shape Stealer’s new toughness is less than any damage on Shape Stealer, Shape Stealer will be destroyed as a state-based action once the triggered ability resolves.

You apply power/toughness changing effects in a series of sublayers in the following order: (a) effects from characteristic-defining abilities; (b) effects that set power and/or toughness to a specific number or value; (c) effects that modify power and/or toughness but don’t set power and/or toughness to a specific number or value; (d) changes from counters; (e) effects that switch a creature’s power and toughness. This card’s effect is always applied in (b), which means that effects applied in sublayer (c), (d), or (e) will not be overwritten; they will be applied to the new value.

Shifting Borders.name: Shifting Borders
Shifting Borders.text:
Exchange control of two target lands.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
Shifting Borders.original_text:
Exchange control of two target lands.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: If one of the targeted lands isn’t a legal target as Shifting Borders resolves (say, because it has left the battlefield or become untargetable), the exchange doesn’t occur.
You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

Trusted Advisor.original_text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by two.
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Trusted Advisor onto the battlefield, your maximum hand size will be four. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

Twincast.name: Twincast
Twincast.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Twincast.flavor: Sometimes you have to search for inspiration, and sometimes it's right there in front of you.
Twincast.original_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: Twincast copies any text spliced onto the targeted spell, but you can’t splice additional text onto the copy.
You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs paid for the targeted spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too.

If the copy says that it affects “you,” it affects the controller of the copy, not the controller of the original spell. Similarly, if the copy says that it affects an “opponent,” it affects an opponent of the copy’s controller, not an opponent of the original spell’s controller.
If the spell Twincast copies is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell Twincast copies has an X whose value was determined as it was cast (like Earthquake does), the copy has the same value of X.
Twincast can target (and copy) any instant or sorcery spell, not just one with targets. It doesn’t matter who controls it.

As Twincast resolves, it creates a copy of a spell. That copy is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger. The copy will then resolve like a normal spell, after players get a chance to cast spells and activate abilities.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can’t choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).

Choice of Damnations.name: Choice of Damnations
Choice of Damnations.text: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.
Choice of Damnations.flavor:
"Life is a series of choices between bad and worse."
—Toshiro Umezawa
Choice of Damnations.original_text: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.

rulings.text: After the opponent chooses a number, Choice of Damnations’ controller may choose to make that opponent either lose that much life or make that opponent sacrifice permanents.

If the opponent must sacrifice all but a number of permanents, that opponent chooses that many permanents and then sacrifices the rest. If the number chosen is greater than the number of permanents the opponent controls, the player sacrifices nothing.

Gnat Miser.original_text: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify a player’s hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Cursed Rack (an artifact that sets a chosen player’s maximum hand size to four) onto the battlefield choosing your opponent and then put Gnat Miser onto the battlefield, your opponent will have a maximum hand size of three. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your opponent’s maximum hand size would be four.

rulings.text: If the Spirit or Arcane spell has {X} in the mana cost, then you use the value of {X} on the stack. For example, Shining Shoal costs {X}{W}{W}. If you choose X = 2, then Shining Shoal’s converted mana cost is 4. Shining Shoal also has an ability that says “You may exile a white card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay Shining Shoal’s mana cost”; if you choose to pay the alternative cost and exile a card with converted mana cost 2, then X is 2 while Shining Shoal is on the stack and its converted mana cost is 4.

Locust Miser.original_text: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by two.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify a player’s hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Cursed Rack (an artifact that sets a chosen player’s maximum hand size to four) onto the battlefield choosing your opponent and then put Locust Miser onto the battlefield, your opponent will have a maximum hand size of two. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your opponent’s maximum hand size would be four.

当祸我进场时，其上每有一个+1/+1指示物，目标牌手便失去1点生命。

Measure of Wickedness.name: Measure of Wickedness
Measure of Wickedness.text:
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Measure of Wickedness and you lose 8 life.
Whenever another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, target opponent gains control of Measure of Wickedness.
Measure of Wickedness.original_text:
At the end of your turn, sacrifice Measure of Wickedness and you lose 8 life.
Whenever another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, target opponent gains control of Measure of Wickedness.

rulings.text: Once the at-end-of-turn ability triggers, it affects the player who controlled Measure of Wickedness at that time. If Measure of Wickedness is under a different player’s control as its at-end-of-turn ability resolves, however, Measure of Wickedness stays on the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Maßstab der Bosheit
foreign_names.text:
Opfere am Ende deines Zuges den Maßstab der Bosheit und verliere 8 Lebenspunkte.
Immer wenn eine andere Karte von irgendwoher auf deinen Friedhof gelegt wird, erhält ein Gegner deiner Wahl die Kontrolle über den Maßstab der Bosheit.

foreign_names.name: Medida de perversión
foreign_names.text:
Al final de tu turno, sacrifica Medida de perversión y pierde 8 vidas.
Siempre que otra carta sea puesta en tu cementerio desde cualquier parte, el oponente objetivo gana el control de la Medida de perversión.

foreign_names.name: Mesure de vilenie
foreign_names.text:
À la fin de votre tour, sacrifiez la Mesure de vilenie et vous perdez 8 points de vie.
À chaque fois qu'une autre carte est mise dans votre cimetière d'où qu'elle vienne, l'adversaire ciblé acquiert le contrôle de la Mesure de vilenie.

foreign_names.name: Indicatore di Malevolenza
foreign_names.text:
Alla fine del tuo turno, sacrifica l'Indicatore di Malevolenza e perdi 8 punti vita.
Ogniqualvolta un'altra carta viene messa nel tuo cimitero da qualsiasi zona, l'avversario bersaglio prende il controllo dell'Indicatore di Malevolenza.

foreign_names.name: 悪意の度量
foreign_names.text:
あなたのターン終了時に、悪意の度量を生け贄に捧げ、あなたは８点のライフを失う。
他のカードがいずれかの領域からあなたの墓地に置かれるたび、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは悪意の度量のコントロールを得る。

foreign_names.name: Medida de Maldade
foreign_names.text:
No final do seu turno, sacrifique Medida de Maldade e você perde 8 pontos de vida.
Toda vez que outro card for colocado em seu cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, o oponente alvo ganha o controle de Medida de Maldade.

foreign_names.name: 恶毒较量
foreign_names.text:
在你的回合结束时，牺牲恶毒较量且你失去8点生命。
每当另一张牌从任何区域置入你的坟墓场，目标对手便获得恶毒较量的操控权。

Neverending Torment.name: Neverending Torment
Neverending Torment.text:
Search target player's library for X cards, where X is the number of cards in your hand, and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)
Neverending Torment.original_text:
Search target player's library for X cards, where X is the number of cards in your hand, and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't play spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

foreign_names.name: Unendliche Qualen
foreign_names.text: Durchsuche die Bibliothek eines Spielers deiner Wahl nach X Karten, wobei X gleich der Anzahl der Karten auf deiner Hand ist, und entferne diese ganz aus dem Spiel. Dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek. Episch (Für den Rest des Spiels kannst du keine Zaubersprüche spielen. Kopiere zu Beginn jedes deiner Versorgungssegmente diesen Zauberspruch außer seiner epischen Fähigkeit. Du kannst neue Ziele für die Kopie bestimmen.)

foreign_names.name: Tormento interminable
foreign_names.text: Busca en la biblioteca del jugador objetivo X cartas, donde X es el número de cartas en tu mano, y remuévelas del juego. Luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca. Épico (No puedes jugar hechizos por el resto del juego. Al comienzo de cada uno de tus mantenimientos, copia este hechizo excepto por su habilidad épica. Puedes elegir un nuevo objetivo para la copia.)

foreign_names.name: Tourment sans fin
foreign_names.text: Cherchez dans la bibliothèque du joueur ciblé X cartes, X étant le nombre de cartes dans votre main, et retirez-les de la partie. Ce joueur mélange ensuite sa bibliothèque. Épique (Pour le restant de la partie, vous ne pouvez pas jouer de sorts. Au début de chacun de vos entretiens, copiez ce sort à l'exception de sa capacité d'épique. Vous pouvez choisir une nouvelle cible pour cette copie.)

foreign_names.name: Tormento Senza Fine
foreign_names.text: Passa in rassegna il grimorio di un giocatore bersaglio, scegli X carte, dove X è pari al numero di carte che hai in mano, e rimuovile dal gioco. Poi quel giocatore rimescola il proprio grimorio. Epopea (Per il resto della partita, non puoi giocare magie. All'inizio di ogni tuo mantenimento, copia questa magia tranne la sua abilità epopea. Puoi scegliere un nuovo bersaglio per la copia.)

foreign_names.name: 無限の苦悩
foreign_names.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーのライブラリーからＸ枚のカードを探し、それらをゲームから取り除く。Ｘはあなたの手札のカードの枚数に等しい。 その後、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。 歴伝 （残りのゲームの間、あなたは呪文をプレイできない。 あなたの各アップキープの開始時に、この呪文を歴伝能力を除いてコピーする。 あなたはコピーの新しい対象を選んでもよい。）

foreign_names.name: Tormento Interminável
foreign_names.text: Procure no grimório do jogador alvo por X cards, sendo X igual ao número de cards em sua mão, e remova-os de jogo. Depois, aquele jogador embaralha seu próprio grimório. Épica (Você não pode jogar mágicas pelo resto do duelo. No início de cada uma de suas manutenções, copie esta mágica menos sua habilidade épica. Você pode escolher um novo alvo para a cópia.)

foreign_names.name: 不尽折磨
foreign_names.text: 从目标牌手的牌库中搜寻X张牌，X为你的手牌数量，并将它们移出对战。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。 历传（这盘游戏结束之前，你不能使用咒语。 在你每回合的维持开始时，复制此咒语，但不包含其历传异能。 你可以为该复制选择新的目标。）

One with Nothing.name: One with Nothing
One with Nothing.flavor: When nothing remains, everything is equally possible.

foreign_names.name: Eins mit dem Nichts
foreign_names.text: Wirf die Karten auf deiner Hand ab.
foreign_names.flavor: Wenn nichts bleibt, ist alles gleichermaßen möglich.

foreign_names.name: En armonía con la nada
foreign_names.text: Descarta tu mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Cuando no queda nada, todo es igualmente posible.

foreign_names.name: Fusion avec le néant
foreign_names.text: Défaussez-vous de votre main.
foreign_names.flavor: Quand seul le néant subsiste, tout est possible.

foreign_names.name: Tutt'uno con il Nulla
foreign_names.text: Scarta la tua mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Quando non rimane nulla, tutto è possibile.

foreign_names.name: 空虚自身
foreign_names.text: あなたの手札を捨てる。
foreign_names.flavor: 何も残らなければ、すべての可能性が等しくなる。

foreign_names.name: Um com o Nada
foreign_names.text: Descarte sua mão.
foreign_names.flavor: Quando nada resta, tudo é igualmente possível.

foreign_names.name: 无何有
foreign_names.text: 弃掉你的手牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 回归空无，才得见万物。

Pain's Reward.name: Pain's Reward
Pain's Reward.text: Each player may bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of any number. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and draws four cards.
Pain's Reward.original_text: You bid any amount of life. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and draws four cards.

rulings.text: Bidding continues until all players except the one with the current high bid have declined to top that bid.
A player may bid more life than they have.

foreign_names.name: Belohnung des Schmerzes
foreign_names.text: Du bietest eine beliebige Anzahl Lebenspunkte. In Zugreihenfolge kann jeder Spieler das Höchstgebot überbieten. Es wird geboten, bis keiner mehr bieten will. Der Spieler mit dem Höchstgebot verliert so viele Lebenspunkte, wie er geboten hat, und zieht vier Karten.

foreign_names.name: Recompensa del dolor
foreign_names.text: Ofrece cualquier cantidad de vida. En orden de turnos, cada jugador puede superar la oferta del otro. La oferta termina si no se supera la oferta mayor. Quien haga la oferta mayor pierde una cantidad de vida igual a la oferta mayor y roba cuatro cartas.

foreign_names.name: Récompense de la souffrance
foreign_names.text: Vous pariez le nombre de points de vie de votre choix. Dans l'ordre du tour, chaque joueur peut surenchérir. L'enchère se termine quand tous les joueurs cessent de surenchérir. Le joueur avec l'enchère la plus élevée perd un nombre de points de vie égal à l'enchère la plus élevée et pioche quatre cartes.

foreign_names.name: Ricompensa del Dolore
foreign_names.text: Scommetti una quantità qualsiasi di punti vita. Seguendo l'ordine di gioco, ciascun giocatore può rilanciare. Le puntate terminano quando nessuno rilancia. Chi ha scommesso di più perde l'ammontare di punti vita che ha puntato e pesca quattro carte.

foreign_names.name: 苦痛の報償
foreign_names.text: あなたはライフの点数を宣言する。 ターンの進行順に、各プレイヤーは宣言されているよりも高いライフの点数を宣言してもよい。 一番高いライフの点数が確定したら、宣言は終了する。 一番高いライフの点数を宣言したプレイヤーは、その点数に等しいライフを失い、カードを４枚引く。

foreign_names.name: Recompensa da Dor
foreign_names.text: Você aposta qualquer quantidade de pontos de vida. Na ordem do turno, cada jogador pode aumentar o lance. A aposta termina no lance mais alto. O maior apostador perde uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual a aposta mais alta e compra quatro cards.

foreign_names.name: 苦痛报偿
foreign_names.text: 你以任意数量的生命来喊价。 依照回合的顺序，每位牌手可出更高的价。 如果无人出更高的价，则此喊价结束。 出最高价的牌手失去等同于其出价的生命，并抓四张牌。

Raving Oni-Slave.name: Raving Oni-Slave
Raving Oni-Slave.text: When Raving Oni-Slave enters or leaves the battlefield, you lose 3 life if you don't control a Demon.
Raving Oni-Slave.original_text:
When Raving Oni-Slave comes into play, you lose 3 life if you don't control a Demon.
When Raving Oni-Slave leaves play, you lose 3 life if you don't control a Demon.

foreign_names.name: Sklave des tobenden Oni
foreign_names.text:
Wenn der Sklave des tobenden Oni ins Spiel kommt, verlierst du 3 Lebenspunkte, falls du keinen Dämonen kontrollierst.
Wenn der Sklave des tobenden Oni das Spiel verlässt, verlierst du 3 Lebenspunkte, falls du keinen Dämonen kontrollierst.

foreign_names.name: Esclavo de oni delirante
foreign_names.text:
Cuando el Esclavo de oni delirante entre en juego, pierdes 3 vidas si no controlas un Demonio.
Cuando el Esclavo de oni delirante deje el juego, pierdes 3 vidas si no controlas un Demonio.

foreign_names.name: Esclave-oni délirant
foreign_names.text:
Quand l'Esclave-oni délirant arrive en jeu, vous perdez 3 points de vie si vous ne contrôlez pas un démon.
Quand l'Esclave-oni délirant quitte le jeu, vous perdez 3 points de vie si vous ne contrôlez pas un démon.

foreign_names.name: Schiavo Delirante degli Oni
foreign_names.text:
Quando lo Schiavo Delirante degli Oni entra in gioco, perdi 3 punti vita se non controlli almeno un Demone.
Quando lo Schiavo Delirante degli Oni lascia il gioco, perdi 3 punti vita se non controlli almeno un Demone.

foreign_names.name: 騒ぎ立てる鬼の奴隷
foreign_names.text:
騒ぎ立てる鬼の奴隷が場に出たとき、あなたがデーモンをコントロールしていないのなら３点のライフを失う。
騒ぎ立てる鬼の奴隷が場を離れたとき、あなたがデーモンをコントロールしていないのなら３点のライフを失う。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — オーガ・戦士

foreign_names.name: Escravo Oni Desvairado
foreign_names.text:
Quando Escravo Oni Desvairado entra em jogo, você perde 3 pontos de vida se não controlar um Demônio.
Quando Escravo Oni Desvairado deixa o jogo, você perde 3 pontos de vida se não controlar um Demônio.

foreign_names.name: 怒号鬼奴
foreign_names.text:
当怒号鬼奴进场时，如果你未操控恶魔，则你失去3点生命。
当怒号鬼奴离场时，如果你未操控恶魔，则你失去3点生命。

Razorjaw Oni.name: Razorjaw Oni
Razorjaw Oni.flavor: It gnashed its teeth, and the battlefield filled with the screech of blade striking blade.

foreign_names.name: Messermaul-Oni
foreign_names.text: Schwarze Kreaturen können nicht blocken.
foreign_names.flavor: Er knirschte mit den Zähnen, und es klang, als würde Klinge auf Klinge treffen.

foreign_names.name: Oni quijada filosa
foreign_names.text: Las criaturas negras no pueden bloquear.
foreign_names.flavor: Apretó los dientes, y el campo de batalla se llenó del chirrido de metal golpeando metal.

foreign_names.name: Oni aux mâchoires de rasoir
foreign_names.text: Les créatures noires ne peuvent pas bloquer.
foreign_names.flavor: Le crissement des lames qui s'entrechoquaient emplissait le champ de bataille quand il grinçait des dents.

foreign_names.name: Oni Zannalama
foreign_names.text: Le creature nere non possono bloccare.
foreign_names.flavor: Digrignò i denti e il campo di battaglia fu sommerso dal clangore delle lame.

foreign_names.name: 剃刀顎の鬼
foreign_names.text: 黒のクリーチャーはブロックに参加できない。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — デーモン・スピリット
foreign_names.flavor: それが歯軋りをする時、戦場には刃と刃のぶつかり合う金切り声が響いた。

foreign_names.name: Oni Mandíbula-de-Navalha
foreign_names.text: As criaturas pretas não podem bloquear.
foreign_names.flavor: Ele rangia seus dentes, e o campo de batalha se enchia do som de lâmina golpeando lâmina.

foreign_names.name: 剃刀颚邪鬼
foreign_names.text: 黑色生物不能进行阻挡。
foreign_names.flavor: 他一咬牙，战场便充斥着兵器交锋的声响。

Shinen of Fear's Chill.name: Shinen of Fear's Chill
Shinen of Fear's Chill.text:
Shinen of Fear's Chill can't block.
Channel — {1}{B}, Discard Shinen of Fear's Chill: Target creature can't block this turn.
Shinen of Fear's Chill.original_text:
Shinen of Fear's Chill can't block.
Channel {1}{B}, Discard Shinen of Fear's Chill: Target creature can't block this turn.

foreign_names.name: Shinen des Angstschweißes
foreign_names.text:
Das Shinen des Angstschweißes kann nicht blocken.
Blutzoll {1}{B}, wirf das Shinen des Angstschweißes aus deiner Hand ab: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht blocken.

foreign_names.name: Shinen del frío del miedo
foreign_names.text:
El Shinen del frío del miedo no puede bloquear.
Canalizar {1}{B}, descartar el Shinen del frío del miedo: La criatura objetivo no puede bloquear este turno.

foreign_names.name: Shinen du froid de la peur
foreign_names.text:
Le Shinen du froid de la peur ne peut pas bloquer.
Transfert — {1}{B}, Défaussez-vous du Shinen du froid de la peur : La créature ciblée ne peut pas bloquer ce tour-ci.

foreign_names.name: Shinen della Paura Infantile
foreign_names.text:
Lo Shinen della Paura Infantile non può bloccare.
Incanalare {1}{B}, Scarta lo Shinen della Paura Infantile: La creatura bersaglio non può bloccare in questo turno.

foreign_names.name: 恐怖の悪寒の思念
foreign_names.text:
恐怖の悪寒の思念はブロックに参加できない。
魂力――{1}{B}, 恐怖の悪寒の思念を捨てる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはこのターンブロックに参加できない。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreign_names.name: Shinen do Arrepio de Medo
foreign_names.text:
Shinen do Arrepio de Medo não pode bloquear.
Canalizar {1}{B}, Descarte Shinen do Arrepio de Medo: A criatura alvo não pode bloquear neste turno.

foreign_names.name: 冷颤思念
foreign_names.text:
冷颤思念不能进行阻挡。
魂力～{1}{B}，弃掉冷颤思念：目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

Sink into Takenuma.name: Sink into Takenuma
Sink into Takenuma.text: Sweep — Return any number of Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Target player discards a card for each Swamp returned this way.
Sink into Takenuma.original_text: Sweep Return any number of Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Target player discards a card for each Swamp returned this way.

foreign_names.name: In Takenuma eindringen
foreign_names.text: Wegfegen Bringe eine beliebige Anzahl an Sümpfen, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Ein Spieler deiner Wahl wirft für jeden auf diese Weise zurückgebrachten Sumpf eine Karte aus seiner Hand ab.

foreign_names.name: Hundir en Takenuma
foreign_names.text: Recolectar Regresa cualquier número de pantanos que controles a la mano de su propietario. El jugador objetivo descarta una carta por cada pantano que hayas regresado de esta manera.

foreign_names.name: Immersion dans Takenuma
foreign_names.text: Balayage — Renvoyez n'importe quel nombre de marais que vous contrôlez dans la main de leur propriétaire. Le joueur ciblé se défausse d'une carte pour chaque marais renvoyé de cette manière.

foreign_names.name: Affondare Takenuma
foreign_names.text: Spazzar via Fai tornare in mano al proprietario un qualsiasi numero di Paludi che controlli. Il giocatore bersaglio scarta una carta per ogni Palude ripresa in questo modo.

foreign_names.name: 竹沼への沈み込み
foreign_names.text: 掃引――あなたがコントロールする沼を望む数だけオーナーの手札に戻す。 プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはこれにより戻された沼の数に等しい枚数のカードを捨てる。

foreign_names.name: Afundar em Takenuma
foreign_names.text: Varredura Devolve qualquer número de Pântanos que você controla para a mão de seus donos. O jogador alvo descarta um card para cada Pântano devolvido dessa maneira.

foreign_names.name: 陷入竹沼
foreign_names.text: 扫平～将任意数量由你操控的沼泽移回其拥有者手上。 每以此法移回一个沼泽，目标牌手便弃一张牌。

Skull Collector.name: Skull Collector
Skull Collector.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a black creature you control to its owner's hand.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Skull Collector.
Skull Collector.flavor: "Your blood I'll use. Your skull I'll keep."
Skull Collector.original_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a black creature you control to its owner's hand.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Skull Collector.

foreign_names.name: Schädelsammler
foreign_names.text:
Bringe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine schwarze Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
{1}{B}: Regeneriere den Schädelsammler.
foreign_names.flavor: „Dein Blut brauche ich. Deinen Schädel behalte ich."

foreign_names.name: Coleccionista de cráneos
foreign_names.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, regresa una criatura negra que controles a la mano de su propietario.
{1}{B}: Regenera el Coleccionista de cráneos.
foreign_names.flavor: "Tu sangre la usaré. Tu cráneo me lo quedaré."

foreign_names.name: Collecteur de crânes
foreign_names.text:
Au début de votre entretien, renvoyez une créature noire que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
{1}{B} : Régénérez le Collecteur de crânes.
foreign_names.flavor: « Ton sang j'utilise. Ton crâne je subtilise. »

foreign_names.name: Collezionista di Teschi
foreign_names.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, il proprietario riprende in mano una creatura nera che tu controlli.
{1}{B}: Rigenera il Collezionista di Teschi.
foreign_names.flavor: "Userò il tuo sangue. Conserverò il tuo teschio."

foreign_names.name: 頭蓋骨の収集家
foreign_names.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがコントロールする黒のクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻す。
{1}{B}：頭蓋骨の収集家を再生する。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — オーガ・戦士
foreign_names.flavor: そなたの血は我が用う。 そなたの骨は我が携う。

foreign_names.name: Colecionador de Crânios
foreign_names.text:
No início de sua manutenção, devolva uma criatura preta que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
{1}{B}: Regenera Colecionador de Crânios.
foreign_names.flavor: "O teu sangue irei usar. O teu crânio irei manter."

foreign_names.name: 搜颅魔
foreign_names.text:
在你的维持开始时，将一个由你操控的黑色生物移回其拥有者手上。
{1}{B}：重生搜颅魔。
foreign_names.flavor: 「鲜血为我用， 头骨为我藏。」

Adamaro, First to Desire.name: Adamaro, First to Desire
Adamaro, First to Desire.text: Adamaro, First to Desire's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the opponent with the most cards in hand.
Adamaro, First to Desire.flavor:
"Beware Adamaro! In him all pain and anger is perfected."
—Isao, Enlightened Bushi
Adamaro, First to Desire.original_text: Adamaro, First to Desire's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the opponent with the most cards in hand.

foreign_names.name: Adamaro, als Erster begehrend
foreign_names.text: Stärke und Widerstandskraft von Adamaro, als Erster begehrend, sind gleich der Anzahl an Karten auf der Hand des Gegners, der die meisten Karten auf der Hand hat.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Fürchtet Adamaro In ihm sind Schmerz und Zorn perfekt vereinigt."
—Isao, Erleuchteter Bushi

foreign_names.name: Adamaro, el primero en desear
foreign_names.text: La fuerza y resistencia de Adamaro, el primero en desear son iguales al número de cartas en la mano del oponente con más cartas en la mano.
foreign_names.flavor:
"¡Cuidado con Adamaro En él, todo el dolor y la furia están perfeccionados."
—Isao, bushi inspirado

foreign_names.name: Adamaro, premier à désirer

Hidetsugu's Second Rite.name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
Hidetsugu's Second Rite.text: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.
Hidetsugu's Second Rite.flavor: Hidetsugu never relinquished a grudge. He let it burn within him, gathering ever greater intensity until the final moment of vengeance.
Hidetsugu's Second Rite.original_text: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.

rulings.text: Since the player’s life total is checked only as the spell resolves, you can cast Hidetsugu’s Second Rite targeting any player, regardless of life total. If the player isn’t at 10 life as Hidetsugu’s Second Rite begins resolving, it does nothing and finishes resolving. Note that since having 10 life is not a targeting restriction, the spell won’t actually be countered for having an illegal target; it just won’t do anything.
